questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: For the next ten years, I'll be fifty-four. I imagine my life with another job in a multicultural context at the Europeen Commission. I'm having trainings to attend my challenge. I imagine my children studying in famous university out of europ and sometimes my hasband and I join them. I wish to will be healthy in a secure world witout war and violence. I think it's an utopy...
